ns:common.topic.description: Extempore is a live coding environment focused on real-time audiovisual software development. It is designed to accommodate the demands of cyber-physical computing. Extempore consists of two integrated languages, Scheme and Extempore Language. It uses the LLVM cross-language compiler to achieve performant DSP and related low-level features, on-the-fly.
rdfs:label: Extempore
ns:type.object.name: Extempore
